name: Serendipity (BugStudios)
description:
If you had a moment in your life that would set you on a path to the hardest choice you'd ever have to make, would you still follow that path? A simple Visual Novel, created as part of the Nottingham Contemporary 'Lina Bo Bardi: An Impossible Reality' student game exhibit!

Meet Natalya. She's what you'd call a jack of all trades. Stepping into class one day, even she didn't have the tools or fortitude necessary to comprehend just what would transpire in the next few hours. 

Features -
  • 14,000 words of fanfiction-level wit, discovery and loss.
  • Simple Visual Novel gameplay that anyone can pick up and read along to!
  • Gorgeous painted sprites and background art
  • Multiple endings - what would you do to protect someone who cares about you?
  • Created by a team of LGBTQ+ artists (and one straight person to keep us in line), based on testimonies from others for an endearing, harrowing, and relatable experience. 
Credits: Character Art - Calum Doyle and Elle Pryor  Environment Art - Lewis Spicer Prop Art - Georgia Weyman Coder - Georgia Weyman Scenario Writers - Mhea Woodward and Marta Kosmider Script Writer - Calum Doyle Music - Yotam Perel (Attributed by Creative Commons)  https://perel.bandcamp.com/album/nameless-7
